input_data.name: NutriTrack - Personalized Nutrition Management App
input_data.description: NutriTrack is a mobile-first web application that helps users track and optimize their nutritional intake based on personal health goals. The app allows users to log meals, scan food barcodes, view nutritional analysis, and receive personalized recommendations. It features a comprehensive food database, customizable meal plans, progress tracking with visual analytics, and integration with popular fitness wearables. The app also includes a social component where users can share recipes, participate in challenges, and connect with nutrition experts for personalized advice. NutriTrack aims to simplify healthy eating by providing actionable insights based on users' dietary patterns and nutritional science, making it easier for people to make informed food choices aligned with their health objectives.

clarification_qa.What are the core features that should b: Meal logging, nutritional analysis, personalized recommendations, and progress tracking.
clarification_qa.Will the app require a subscription mode: Yes, we plan to have a freemium model with basic features free and advanced analytics and personalized coaching as premium features.
clarification_qa.Are there any specific integrations need: Integration with Apple Health, Google Fit, and potentially major fitness wearables like Fitbit.
clarification_qa.What level of personalization should the: Recommendations should consider user goals (weight loss, muscle gain, health maintenance), dietary restrictions, allergies, and past eating habits.
clarification_qa.How important is the social component to: For the MVP, focus on the core tracking and recommendation features. The social aspects can be implemented in later phases.
